Shockwave/Firestarter:




A transmission was received by Shockwave from Unitron that went as:

"The so-called Megatron is indeed an impstor.  Despite obvious flaws in the 
character he is trying to portray, in the middle of a battle he had two of 
his lackeys come attack me as I nearly finished him off."

Shockwave looked to Firestarter.  "You have command presently.  Things have 
escalated with Unitron and the impostor pretending to be Megatron.  I will go 
aid Unitron, you can handle things here." the near emotionless bot intoned.

"Understood." Firestarter replied as Shockwave left the bridge for the 
nearest access hatch.
